title: x/mobile/motion: add orientation, gyroscope and accelerometer APIs
body:
Given the fact device motion and rotation are two of the main user inputs in games, we should consider adding related APIs.

http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/sensors/sensors_overview.html
https://developer.apple.com/library/prerelease/ios/documentation/CoreMotion/Reference/CoreMotion_Reference/index.html
